summary: A female assassin receives a dangerous mission to kill a political leader in eighth-century China.
cast: Qi Shu|Chen Chang|Yun Zhou|Satoshi Tsumabuki|Dahong Ni|Mei Yong|Zhen Yu Lei|Nikki Hsieh|Ethan Juan|Fang-yi Sheu|Jacques Picoux|Shao-Huai Chang|Ti-Ying Hsueh|Fang Mei|Chun Shih
title: The assassin
